channel.description:
[CENTER][B][URL=http://"https://dl.dropboxusercontent.com/u/151756264/Saradomin%202.7.jar"]Play Now[/URL] [URL=http://"http://saradomin.makeforum.net/"]Forums[/URL] [URL=http://"http://saradominps.weebly.com/"]Home[/URL]
[center]Features
24 Working Competetive Skills 13+ Bosses to fight 7+ Minigames to encounter 3 Quests to complete Dual Slayer with distance check and multiple tasks Dwarf Multicannon Handcannon Dwarf Hand Cannoneers (drops shots) Saving Teleports for quick access A Skilling Task Minigame Slayer with boss tasks Armadyl battlestaff with crafting armadyl runes Full Ape Atoll access Completionist Cape Requirements (Hard) Max cape obtaining Variety of shops for starters A homemade starters area with skilling zone implemented 20+ Achievements to complete A Highscores to compete with the other players Prestigeing for points or ranks Full on organized quest book with clickable text (Statistics etc.)
And so so so much more..[/center]
